name: CAO - Hurricane - Hurricane
additionalNotes: CAO Hurricane is a most-flavorful addition to the prestigious CAO portfolio. Originally introduced in the Last Stick Standing contest, the Hurricane was crowned the winner, after becoming the clear fan favorite. Bursting with flavor and strength, this is a top-seller among CAO lovers.Â Patiently crafted and blended, the impressive CAO Hurricane is a maelstrom of flavor and spice. Intense from the get go, expect notes of leather, earth, and toffee swirled up in the spicy but creamy clouds of smoke each stick produces in spades.
